metadata.title: CVE-2020-15803 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Zabbix before 3.0.32rc1, 4.x before 4.0.22rc1, 4.1.x through 4.4.x before 4.4.10rc1, and 5.x before 5.0.2rc1 allows stored XSS in the URL Widget. It was discovered that Zabbix did not properly validate input. A remote attacker could exploit this to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.0.2+dfsg-1').
